mapper.select: select U.USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_TEL, USER_TEL_SUB, USER_BIRTH ,JOINDATE, USER_GRADE, ACTIVE, REPLACE(NVL(max(RESERVATION_STATE),'X'),'N','O') RES_STATE from TB_USER U LEFT JOIN ( select user_id, RESERVATION_STATE from TB_RESERVATION WHERE RESERVATION_STATE='N' ) R ON U.user_id = R.user_id GROUP BY U.USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_TEL, USER_TEL_SUB, USER_BIRTH ,JOINDATE, USER_GRADE, ACTIVE order by joinDate desc
